page.title: 03SCADGHILL FARM NEAR BUDE
page.content: Scaghill Farm is 215 acres in size.It is mostly pasture with some barley and corn fields.The farm has 105 cows mostly Friesians and 1 heifer, 52 sheep, 12 lambs, and some poultry. There are 9 buildings and 25 fields. The farm produces milk which goes to {Torrington.}It also produces meat since{E.E.C}quotas have limited milk production.Mr. Dingle like many farmers is not happy about this. The farm has a{herringbone parlour which takes 6 cows at a time.It has a{ {computerized feeding system}which gives each cow the right amount of food and stops the cow overeating. There is also a machine that shreads the food for the cows.There are 3 tractors, a combine-harvester, a bailer, a silager and a thresher.
